thread.title: Bitcoin falls; half its value lost in 2018

title: Bitcoin falls; half its value lost in 2018
text:
Bitcoin falls; half its value lost in 2018 2:50pm GMT - 01:27 
Bitcoin slid another 13 percent to below $6,000 on Tuesday, bringing the world's best-known cryptocurrency's losses to more than half since the start of 2018. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Bitcoin slid another 13 percent to below $6,000 on Tuesday, bringing the world's best-known cryptocurrency's losses to more than half since the start of 2018. Kate King reports.
